title: Help ID a font
content:
Can anyone help ID the font used in the movie CABARET with Liza Minnelli?  
Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cabaret\_party\_theme-300x243.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823083854/http:/typophile.com/files/cabaret_party_theme-300x243.jpg) | 12.46 KB |
author: lis904

comments.content: Based on [Art Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823083854/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/art+gothic)? Solotype's cleaner version under the name of... [Cabaret](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823083854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/cabaret) :)
